summary: Lighter fur color for Savior\'s Hide
descriptionHtml:
[b][u]Lighter Fur for Savior\'s Hide[/b][/u]
I honestly got tired of seeing [color=brown]BROWN[/color] fur for all armors, so I decided to make this one a bit special.

[b]\"But there are no gauntlets, gloves, boots, etc. to go with it!\"[/b]
[b][color=red]WRONG![/color][/b]

I\'ve created a side file just for this outfit. It\'s optional, but I modded the Wolf Armor in the game to have white fur as well. 

And before you ask...
[b][u]YES, I\'ve released a Wolf Armor re-texture to go with the newly made \"light fur\" boots & gauntlets[/b][/u]. Now there\'s no mis-matching in game.

Wolf Armor - Lighter Fur
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7343

_____________________________________

[b][u]Version 0.1:[/b][/u]
- Lighter fur for Savior\'s Hide
- Retextured Wolf boots & gauntlets to go with the Hide
_____________________________________

[b][u]Installation[/b][/u]
[b][color=red]Nexus Mod Manager[/color][/b]
1. Download the Nexus Mod Manager (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/content/modmanager/)
2. On the \"Files\" tab of this page, click the file you want and choose \"Download With Manager\"
3. Look at your Nexus Mod Manager window and wait for the mod to download
4. Once downloaded, activate the mod via \"Mods\" tab

[b][color=red]Manual Download[/color][/b]
1. Download the mod via \"Files\" tab of this page
2. Extract the .zip file
3. Place the folder in your Skyrim folder, wherever it\'s located - Steam or whatever. (If you already have a \"Data\" folder, choose merge the two folders.)

Please give me feedback on any bugs or fixes you would like to see taken care of. ;3 Thanks.
author: Tandellin
